elements.title: Orii of the Orient
elements.contents: ... that dozens of mammals and birds were first described from specimens collected by "Orii of the Orient" (pictured)?

elements.title: FM encoding
elements.contents: ... that early floppy disks used FM encoding that took up only half the available storage?

elements.title: John D'Orazio
elements.contents: ... that politician John D'Orazio helped to secure a three-year trial of daylight saving time in Western Australia?

elements.title: Red Hill water crisis
elements.contents: ... that the Red Hill water crisis has caused a water shortage in Honolulu?

elements.title: Ekaterina Novitskaya
elements.contents: ... that Ekaterina Novitskaya, then aged 16, became the first female ever to win the Queen Elisabeth Competition for piano?

elements.title: SCR-720
elements.contents: ... that the 1944 SCR-720 radar system was used only briefly by the USAAF, but was a primary RAF system into the late 1950s?

elements.title: Ernest Muir
elements.contents: ... that the Scottish medical missionary Ernest Muir championed the use of the traditional Ayurvedic cure chaulmoogra oil in treating Hansen's disease (leprosy)?

elements.title: a Pennsylvania TV station
elements.contents: ... that a Pennsylvania TV station is experimenting with datacasting educational content to school students and prison inmates?
